001package reciprocal.geometry.rectangle;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
008
009/**
010 * Immutable implementation of a rectangle which uses {@link Double} as type for
011 * its length and width
012 *
013 * @since 0.0.1
014 */
015public final class Rectangle extends AbstractRectangle<Double, Rectangle> {
016    @Serial
017    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
018
019    /**
020     * Constructor
021     *
022     * @param length length
023     * @param width width
024     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code length <= 0}
025     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code width <= 0}
026     * @since 0.0.1
027     */
028    public Rectangle(final double length, final double width) {
029        super(length, width);
030        checkArgument(length > 0.0D, "length > 0 expected but length = %s", length);
031        checkArgument(width > 0.0D, "width > 0 expected but width = %s", width);
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public boolean isSquare() {
036        return getLength().compareTo(getWidth()) == 0;
037    }
038
039    @Override
040    public @NotNull Double getPerimeter() {
041        return 2.0D * (getLength() + getWidth());
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    public @NotNull Double getDiagonal() {
046        return Math.sqrt(Math.pow(getLength(), 2.0D) + Math.pow(getWidth(), 2.0D));
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public @NotNull Rectangle withLength(final @NotNull Double newLength) {
051        requireNonNull(newLength, "newLength");
052        checkArgument(newLength > 0.0D, "newLength > 0 expected but newLength = %s", newLength);
053        return new Rectangle(newLength, getWidth());
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public @NotNull Rectangle withWidth(final @NotNull Double newWidth) {
058        requireNonNull(newWidth, "newWidth");
059        checkArgument(newWidth > 0.0D, "newWidth > 0 expected but newWidth = %s", newWidth);
060        return new Rectangle(getLength(), newWidth);
061    }
062}
